column3: Here is a test that fails before and succeeds after this PR: https://github.com/sipa/bitcoin/commit/ce238f2aff3253cdde88d0f9b995b7e0016cb52b
@achow101 Feel free to cherry-pick the test into this PR.\n\nThat RPC test is a reproduction of what I did to notice the issue in the first place, so Tested ACK from me.

* #14588 (Refactor PSBT signing logic to enforce invariant and fix signing bug by gwillen)
* #13932 (Additional utility RPCs for PSBT by achow101)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should
